llm_res.rule: The ERC721 standard requires that the balance of an owner must always be equal to their number of ownership slots.
The function SHOULD throw if the message caller’s account balance does not have enough tokens to spend.
The ERC721 standard requires that the balance of an owner must always be equal to their number of ownership slots.
Transfers of 0 values MUST be treated as normal transfers and fire the Transfer event.
